original_text: A dead person thinks only about himself. He feels his own pain and he is very sad.’ A dead person thinks only about himself. He feels his own pain and he is very sad.’ A dead person thinks only about himself. He feels his own pain and he is very sad.’ A dead person thinks only about himself.
korean_text: 다만 그의 살이 아프고 그의 영혼이 애곡할 뿐이니이다

sentences.original_text: A dead person thinks only about himself.
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 사람은 오직 자기 자신에 대해서만 생각합니다.
